sentences.en: He asked a few more questions, to which he received unsatisfactory answers.
sentences.cn: 他又问了几个问题，得到的答案都不令人满意。

sentences.en: I resent your implication that my work is unsatisfactory.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌你这话的弦外之音,似乎我的工作不能令人满意.

sentences.en: If the car you have leased is clearly unsatisfactory, you can always exchange it for another.
sentences.cn: 如果你对租借的车明显不满意，可随时另换一辆。

sentences.en: Many of the earlier reports were subsequently shown to be unsatisfactory.
sentences.cn: 许多较早的文献结果都显得不够理想.

sentences.en: Merchandise will be exchanged if found unsatisfactory.
Reception of the television programmes is unsatisfactory here.
sentences.cn: 这地区电视节目的接收情况不能令人满意.

sentences.en: Reception of TV programmes is unsatisfactory here.
sentences.cn: 这里电视节目的接收情况不佳.

sentences.en: Shops are often reluctant to take back unsatisfactory goods.
sentences.cn: 商店一般都不愿收回顾客不称心的货物.

sentences.en: The film's ending is an unsatisfactory cop-out.
sentences.cn: 电影回避式的结局让人不满。

sentences.en: The inspectors said just under a third of lessons were unsatisfactory.
sentences.cn: 督察员说只有不到1/3的课程不够好。

sentences.en: The present system of funding for higher education is unsatisfactory.
sentences.cn: 目前高等教育的经费体制并不令人满意。

sentences.en: The results are often unsatisfactory because of the paucity of cells.
sentences.cn: 因细胞稀少,结果常令人不满意.

sentences.en: The student's work was judged unsatisfactory.
sentences.cn: 这个学生的作业被认为是不能令人满意的.

sentences.en: They demand a refund on unsatisfactory goods.
sentences.cn: 他们对不满意的货品要求退款.

sentences.en: Your conduct leaves a lot to be desired , ie is extremely unsatisfactory.

trans.tran_cn: 不能令人满意的，不符合要求的，不满足的
trans.tran_en: not good enough or not acceptable
